content: this pattern is for a coasters and the holder to store them in the holder is made with a side opening so the coasters are easy to grab and easy to see i used a medium weight 4 cotton yarn and an h hook but this can be made with any yarn weight and the appropriate hook for that yarn this project is a great way to use up spare yarn you have sitting around and works wonderfully as a gift or as an item to sell at craft fairs or on etsy i hope you enjoy this pattern happy crocheting
